nodes.bodyText: assessment.getCategoryId() can be null or a String so can't use NumberUtils.toLong on it
yeah it's on assessmentSettings.getCategorySelected() not assessment.getCategoryId() and assessment.getCategoryId() is a Long
Initializing selected with a default and then using equals should be all that is needed as selected.equals(assessment.getCategoryId()); will account for a null assessment.getCategoryId()
if -1 equals 0 or null then it would trigger the re-creation of the gb item ....

So lets simplify your if statement with:
return (oldCatId > 0 || newCatId > 0) && oldCatId.compareTo(newCatId) != 0;
